title: [EUW][Dia+] VELOCITY - looking for talented players for ALL roles
body:
**Hey everyone!**
My name is Nick, 20 years old from Germany, founder of VELOCITY, playing League since season 1 and I'm looking forward to building a League team from scratch!

We are currently looking for players of any age/gender for **ALL ROLES**

here are some things that are super important to us:

1)the will to improve individually and as a team
2)role specific and general game knowledge
3)good communicative skills
4)the will to change and adapt to the team's playstyle
5)the ability to take criticism
6)you are currently at least Diamond in SoloQ/FlexQ

-We are looking to schedule team practice 3 to 4 times a week in order to not only improve individual skills but to also work and improve on the team's synergy.

-Every practice will be concluded by a short recap of the day. Members (players and other staff) will be asked to take notes during the practice in order to give feedback during the round-up meetings.

-A schedule for the upcoming week will be worked out every Sunday evening.

Interested? feel free to contact us at [Discord: **Pyrana#4878**]!
We will try our best to find at least half an hour of time to talk with everyone who's interested in joining and participating in the team!
